Normal

```js
<FAB>favorite</FAB>
```

Mini

```js
<FAB mini>add</FAB>
```

Exited (click the button!)

```js
class FABExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { exited: false };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <FAB
        exited={this.state.exited}
        onClick={() => {
          this.setState({ exited: true }, () =>
            setTimeout(() => this.setState({ exited: false }), 1000)
          );
        }}
      >
        favorite_border
      </FAB>
    );
  }
}

<FABExample />;
```
